paper.title: Model Checking the Full Modal Mu-Calculus for Infinite Sequential Processes
paper.venue: International Colloquium on Automata, Languages and Programming
paper.abstract: In this paper we develop a new exponential algorithm for model-checking infinite sequential processes, including context-free processes, pushdown processes, and regular graphs, that decides the full modal mu-calculus. Whereas the actual model checking algorithm results from considering conditional semantics together with backtracking caused by alternation, the corresponding correctness proof requires a stronger framework, which uses dynamic environments modelled by finite-state automata.
